description.p: This tool belt has an interior space considerably larger than its outside dimensions, roughly 2 feet in diameter at the mouth and 5 feet deep. The tool belt can hold up to 500 pounds, not exceeding a volume of 64 cubic feet. The bag weighs 15 pounds, regardless of its contents. Retrieving an item from the bag requires an action.
As a gift from Gond, the tool belt can not be overloaded, pierced, or torn. The tool belt however can only be used to store tools and materials.
